aequitas.fairflow.datasets.GenericDataset

class aequitas.fairflow.datasets.GenericDataset(target_feature: str, sensitive_feature: str, categorical_features: list[str] = [], dataset_path: str | Path | None = None, train_path: str | Path | None = None, validation_path: str | Path | None = None, test_path: str | Path | None = None, split_type: Literal['random', 'feature'] = 'random', split_values: dict[Literal['train', 'validation', 'test'], Any] = {'test': 0.15, 'train': 0.7, 'validation': 0.15}, split_feature: str | None = None, extension: str = 'parquet', seed: int = 42)[source]
Attributes:
data

Return the dataset.

test

Return the test split of the dataset.

train

Return the training split of the dataset.

validation

Return the validation split of the dataset.

Methods

create_splits()

Split the data into train, validation, and test sets.

load_data()

Load the dataset.
